=================================================

Len Goodman and Lucy Worsley uncover the British love affair with dancing, exploring the nation's favourite dances from the 17th to the 20th centuries.

1/3 How dancing came to be celebrated as an essential social skill in the 18th century.

2/3 How our dance floors were revolutionised in the 19th century by faster, freer dances.

3/3 How the early 20th century saw the most revolutionary change in British dance history.
